fightingStyle.Archery: +2 bonus to rolls you make with ranged weapons
fightingStyle.Defense: While wearing armor, you gain +1 bonus to AC
fightingStyle.Dueling: When weilding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, +2 damage rolls with weapon
fightingStyle.GreatWeaponFighting: You can reroll a 1 or 2 rolled on damage dice with a two handed weapon. You must use new results.
fightingStyle.Protection: If weilding a shield, you can impose disadvantage on attacks that targets another creature within 5 feet of you
fightingStyle.TwoWeaponFighting: When using two weapon fighting, you can add your ability mod to your off hand weapons damage roll

SpecFighter.secondWind: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to restore 1d10 + (1)fighter level hit points.
